data.text: @DarrenMcGrady THE QUEEN NEEDS TO REALIZE THOMAS WAS DRAGGED INTO THIS.HE DIDN'T SIGN UP FOR IT,HE WAS DRAGGED INTO IT.ALL HE WANTS IS TO SEE HIS DAUGHTER.I RESPECT THE QUEEN+THE ROYAL FAMILY'S INCREDIBLE PHILANTHROPY AROUND THE WORLD...HOWEVER, THOMAS IS AMERICAN+HE JUST WANTS TO SEE HIS KID..
@DarrenMcGrady Thomas Markle and the half sister clearly want to be paid off to go away by the Royal Family. It looks like border-line extortion at this point.  They are an embarrassment to the USA.

@DarrenMcGrady But now, Thomas Markle will never be able to sell & profit from any children Meghan & Harry may have. Public sympathy is with the couple as they cut him off. His rantings are past disturbed, he’s unhinged.
No one who threatens as he is now should be near M&H’s children...Ever. https://t.co/HNd9b6F9hE

@DarrenMcGrady It’s obvious he did this interview to get her attention to make her feel guilty to call him and he will report their private conversations back to the press again for another interview in exchange for cash like he did with Piers Morgan. She and Harry are done with his games

@DarrenMcGrady Meghan is officially done with her father with his emotional blackmail games cause this last interview just showed who he really is, he’s all about cashing in on his daughter that’s why he is doing all these interviews and making up crap like “oh she looks terrified” statements.

@Town66 @DarrenMcGrady How can she, the couple told him to stop talking to the press but he continues on doing it and they see can’t control him and he’s doing it for cash. The man is cashing in on her and Meghan is not going to be putting up with his emotional blackmail games with her anymore.
@DarrenMcGrady Why dosen’t Meghan sort things out with her father so we dont have read about what he thinks in the papers
@DarrenMcGrady He needs to keep quiet. He should continue to write to her and apologize. There is no reason to keep flapping his lips to the newspapers or television.
@DarrenMcGrady Why will she be terrified of shameless Markle. We all know what Markles stand for. ‘Disgrace’
@DarrenMcGrady sadly, I’m sure you’re correct. If Mr. Markle ever wants to see his “Bean” again, he’d better shut it!
